welcome: Shatter the barriers of speed, soar through the skies like a smooth path

translate.title: Submit Translation Files / Contribute to Translation Work
translate.subtitle: We Need You
translate.q1: How can I get the translation files?
translate.a1: We host the translation files on GitHub. You can visit our i18n repository for details.
translate.q2: How can I submit translation files?
translate.a2: Simply submit a PR in the GitHub repository.

downloads.title: Welcome to TeasBHOP Downloads Page

forDesktop.a1: The drawer on the left side of the page usually opens automatically. You can select the resources you want to download from the left drawer.
forDesktop.a2: Click on corresponding resources to view details.

forMobile.a1: The left drawer is hidden by default. You need to click the list icon on the left side of the navigation bar to expand the drawer.
forMobile.a2: After expanding, you can select the resources you want to download from the drawer.
forMobile.a3: Click on corresponding resources to view details.

notice.title: Important Notice Before Downloading
notice.value:
If you use 123 Cloud Storage for downloading, you need to pay for traffic (Â¥0.06/GB).
You can download for free after registering/logging into a 123 Cloud Storage account.
70% of the traffic fee goes to the cloud storage platform, while 30% goes to TeasOfficial.
notice.github:
GitHub has poor support for Chinese network environment.
You can use steamcommunity 302 or Watt Toolkit to accelerate access.

mmod.value:
MetaMod: Source and SourceMod have poor support for Chinese network environment.
We recommend using network proxy software before downloading. We currently don't provide mirror download links, please understand!

downloads.tips: You can always return to this page by clicking 'Back to Home' in the drawer.

x64.title: BHOP Local Server Download - 64-bit New Version

notice1.title: Usage Notice (Recommended Reading)
notice1.value:
1. Run server.bat to start the local server
2. To add administrators, add the following line at the end of \cstrike\addons\sourcemod\configs\admin_simple.ini:
"STEAM_0:0:XXXXXXX""z"

If you don't know your steamid, check it at https://steamid.io/
3. !admin in Timer Commands can add or remove zones and records
4. Other common commands:
!js to view ssj jhud and other jump data
!nv to enable night vision !nvs for night vision settings
!line to show routes !bash2 to show anti-cheat logs

MetaMod: Source and SourceMod are system-specific!
Windows version cannot be used on Linux, and vice versa. Please check your server system version before downloading!
notice1.title: Installation Notice (Recommended Reading)
